channel.title: nvidia-docker on Ydn's personal blog.
channel.description: Recent content in nvidia-docker on Ydn's personal blog.

item.title: Nvidia Docker and Docker Compose Enabled
item.description: Recently, I rely much on docker. Almost all of my projects already dockerised and it working flawlessly. The main reason of using docker is because it’s easy to maintain and isolated, not make your host OS dirty with tons of files and dependencies. And, since I am working closely with my coleague at the office we use docker as part of our workflow. Sharing projects, doing CI/CD and releasing updates to our Kubernetes cluster never as easy and seamless like this before.
